meanings.definition: The act of performing an ollie on a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: Ollieing is a fun trick to do at the skate park.
meanings.sent2: Skateboarders practice ollieing to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, his ollieing made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: Her ollieing was like a graceful dance on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ollieing echoed through the empty skate park.

meanings.definition: The technique of jumping with a skateboard by pressing down on the tail and sliding the front foot up the board.
meanings.sent1: Learning ollieing requires good balance and coordination.
meanings.sent2: He showed off his ollieing skills to his friends at the park.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried ollieing on the skateboard, but it didn't go well.
meanings.sent4: Her ollieing was as smooth as gliding on ice.
meanings.sent5: The crowd gasped at the height of his ollieing jump.
